text: hello again guys it's me Steven from
langmaster learning system welcome back
to our channel in today's video I'll
guide you through some short stories to
improve your listening skills in part
three of our storytime series let's do
it Story number one go to work
Patricia did not have much time it was
time to go to work she did not want to
be late for work she would lose her job
if she was late
she finished her coffee she drank the
last drop she put the coffee cup in the
kitchen sink and turned on the kitchen
faucet she poured water into the cup
then turned off the faucet she picked up
her keys the keys were on the kitchen
table she grabbed her grey coat her grey
coat was on the chair the chair was next
to the door she walked outside she
locked her door with her house key
Story number two fresh fish
Mike was ready for bed it was 11 o'clock
he had to get up early the next day the
next day he was going fishing fish wake
up early they look for food early in the
day they look for food late in the day
the best time to fish is early or late
in the day that is when the fish are
hungry
Mike set his alarm he set his alarm for
five o'clock the next day he would start
fishing at 6 o'clock he wanted to catch
four or five fish
if he caught four or five fish he could
eat fresh fish all week fresh fish is
the best fish Mike went to bed story
number three life is good I
am happy I have many friends I have a
large family I have four brothers and
four sisters I am in the middle four
brothers are older than me four sisters
are younger than me I go to school I am
in the sixth grade I like my teachers my
teachers like me I have friends in every
class my favorite class is history I
like to read about history
history is a story about our past soon
we will all be history then kids in
school will read about us I hope they
like our stories my best friend is Bobby
Bobby and I do many things together we
swim together play basketball together
and ride our bikes together I have many
other friends we all go to the mall on
weekends we go to the movies go to
restaurants and tell jokes we laugh we
have fun life is great story number four
melted cheese
Stephen was hungry what could he eat he
looked in the refrigerator he saw some
orange cheese he saw some yellow butter
he knew what he would eat he would eat a
melted cheese sandwich
he took the cheese and butter out of the
refrigerator he buttered two slices of
bread he sliced the cheese and put it
between the two buttered slices he
heated the frying pan he put the cheese
sandwich into the frying pan after three
minutes he flipped the sandwich over
after three more minutes he put the
melted cheese sandwich on a plate he cut
the sandwich into two pieces he took the
sandwich to the dining room table and
sat down he ate the sandwich it was
delicious
Story number five eggs and apples Emma
went to the market she needed to buy
food she needed brown eggs
she opened the carton of brown eggs she
looked at the eggs none of them were
cracked none of them were broken all the
eggs were okay she closed the carton she
put the carton of eggs in her shopping
cart she needed red apples she looked at
a bag of red apples she looked for dark
spots on the apples she looked for worm
holes in the apples she didn't see any
dark spots or worm holes she put the bag
of apples in her shopping cart
okay everybody that's the end of our
story time series I hope you used the
short stories series to improve your
English listening skills now don't be
afraid to listen to them all again to
make sure you can understand everything
I really hope you all enjoyed it this
series is all finished but we will have
many more coming out soon make sure to
subscribe to our Channel so you don't
miss our next video and if you enjoyed
this video and think it might help your
friends then like and share it and if
you're looking for a suitable English
course leave your email and your phone
number in the comment box below one more
time I'm Steven from Lane master
learning system I'll see you next time
bye bye
